hero.title: Find the best service providers for your needs
hero.subtitle: Connect with trusted professionals in your city with ease and security.
hero.search_placeholder: What service are you looking for?

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your questions instantly. Need more guidance? Dive into our extensive documentation for all your queries.
faq.q1: How do I get started as a freelancer?
faq.a1: Sign up, complete your profile, and start browsing projects. Submit proposals and communicate with clients to get hired.
faq.q2: What kind of projects can I find?
faq.a2: You can find a wide range of projects in various fields such as web development, design, writing, and more.
faq.q3: How do I ensure payment security?
faq.a3: We use a secure payment system that ensures the rights of both the client and the freelancer through the escrow feature.
faq.q4: What fees are involved for freelancers?
faq.a4: Our fees are competitive and transparent, with a small percentage deducted from each completed project to cover platform operating costs.
faq.q5: How can I build trust with clients?
faq.a5: By completing your profile, showcasing your previous work, and getting positive reviews from previous clients.

featured.title: Your One-Stop Online Marketplace for Everything You Need

support.title: Help & Support
support.subtitle: We are here to help you with any questions or issues.
support.article_1: How to post a work request?
support.article_1_content: To post a new request, log in and click 'Add Work' in the header. Fill in project details like title, description, and budget.
support.article_2: How to choose the right provider?
support.article_2_content: Review proposals, check provider profiles, and read previous client reviews to make an informed decision.
support.article_3_content: We secure your payments until the work is completed and you are satisfied with the delivery.
support.article_4_content: You can cancel your request from the request details page as long as work hasn't started.
support.provider_article_1_content: To verify your profile, upload your ID and portfolio items.
support.provider_article_2_content: Complete work on time and communicate well to get better reviews.
support.provider_article_3_content: We charge a standard 15% commission fee on completed projects.
support.provider_article_4_content: Go to your wallet settings to link a bank account for withdrawal.
support.general_article_1_content: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to reset via email.
support.general_article_2_content: Contact support to update your registered email address.
support.general_article_3_content: We respect your privacy. Your data is encrypted and protected.
support.general_article_4_content: By using our platform, you agree to our standard terms of service.
support.guide_client_step_1_desc: Create a client account and explore services.
support.guide_client_step_2_desc: Add project details, budget, and deadline to receive proposals.
support.guide_client_step_3_desc: Compare proposals, choose the best fit, and start working securely.
support.guide_provider_step_1_desc: Add your skills, bio, and a strong portfolio to attract clients.
support.guide_provider_step_2_desc: Find projects matching your skills and submit convincing proposals.
support.guide_provider_step_3_desc: Deliver high-quality work, get paid, and earn great reviews.
